name: SMART Response Teacher Database File
summary: Learn about .TEACHER files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: A .TEACHER file is an educational settings file created by SMART Response software. It is used in educational setups to provide a complete environment of managing classroom information, class lists, schedules, holidays, student profiles, exams routine, and assessment results. SMART Responseâ„¢ assessment software is installed on the computer that will be used to deliver SMART Response assessments.

SMART Response software is a classroom assessment tool designed by SMART Technologies, primarily used to create, deliver and track assessments in educational environments. It is integrated with SMART interactive whiteboards and other SMART classroom technology, enabling teachers to assess student understanding in real-time and gather data to guide instructional decisions.

File created by SMART Response software, which is used in educational settings to help teachers and students manage classroom information; contains class lists, student profiles, and assessment results; used to generate student reports as well as transfer classroom data between school computers.
